MeetAqsaGulzar,WinnerOfBronzeMedalInPenc.name: Meet Aqsa Gulzar, winner of bronze medal in Pencak Silat Championship
MeetAqsaGulzar,WinnerOfBronzeMedalInPenc.summary: Aqsa Gulzar has won a Bronze Medal in the recently concluded World Pencak Silat Championship 2022 in Malaysia. She hails from downtown area of Srinagar. Aqsa completed her study in downtown and developed interest in the Pencak Silat. She participated in many state and national level championships. Aqsa also got various medals in the Pencak Silat game. She got selected for the Indian Pencak Silat for International Championship which was held in Malaysia.

MeetYiKai,AChineseStudentWho’SFallenInLo.name: Meet Yi Kai, a Chinese student who’s fallen in love with silat | Crossing Cultures
MeetYiKai,AChineseStudentWho’SFallenInLo.summary: Though he’s only in his second year, his dedication and respect for the culture behind the sport shows that passion matters more than background. This is a story about breaking barriers and finding connection through martial arts.

PhPencakSilatRepresentativeTalksAboutOve.name: PH Pencak Silat representative talks about overcoming challenges through sports | Early Edition
PhPencakSilatRepresentativeTalksAboutOve.summary: Philippines' representative to the SEA Games for Pencak Silat Cherry Regalado talks about her passion and the challenges she faced while pursuing her sport.
